lead_paragraph: An ex-con and aspirant filmmaker set out to manufacture a horror film by scaring people however, when it goes too far and someone actually dies, the pair decides that killing for real on film is the only way to make a truly terrifying movie.
snippet: An ex-con and aspirant filmmaker set out to manufacture a horror film by scaring people however, when it goes too far and someone actually dies, the pair decides that killing for real on film is the only way to make a truly terrifying movie.
